Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Pearson
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted EB: Chicago, State and Illinois; WB: Grand, State and Chicago due to street blockage near Michigan/Pearson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Pearson due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Chicago, State and Illinois.

Westbound buses will operate via Grand, State and Chicago.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/Pearson
ShortDescription: Northbound 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Chicago, State, Wacker and Michigan due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Chicago, State, Wacker and Michigan due to street blockage near Michigan/Pearson.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between O'Hare and Jefferson Park
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between O'Hare and Jefferson Park due to an animal on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between O'Hare and Jefferson Park due to an animal on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating only between Forest Park and Jefferson Park at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between O'Hare and Jefferson Park to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
